short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarizes any selected text using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension uses GPT to provide instant, intelligent summaries of any selected text. Built with [Plasmo](https://docs.plasmo.com/) and powered by OpenAI's GPT models.

You put your OpenAI API key in, it gets stored locally, then right click on any text in the browser and use "Get the Gist of It" to summarize it.
